org.promasi.core
Interface IStatePersister

public interface IStatePersister

Persists the state of the SdModel for a specific step. The SdSystem uses this interface to persist the state of it's model for each step, so that graphical representations of the SdModel can be made.

Author:
eddiefullmetal

Method Summary
 void close()
          Closes the persister.
 void initialize(SdModel model)
          Initializes the persister.
 void persistModel(double time)
          Saves all the values of the model (all ISdObjects).
 

Method Detail

initialize

void initialize(SdModel model)
Initializes the persister.

Parameters:
model - The model to persist.

persistModel

void persistModel(double time)
Saves all the values of the model (all ISdObjects).

Parameters:
time - The time(step) that the values was stored.

close

void close()
Closes the persister. This method is called when the SdSystem has finished.
